item.title: Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Indian-made artificial intelligence (AI) platform Ola Krutrim has introduced its cutting-edge AI Cloud infrastructure, called Krutrim Cloud. It has also launched the Krutrim Assistant mobile app, unveiling its ambitious vision for fostering innovation and accessibility in India’s AI sector. This initiative signals a shift in India’s technological landscape, empowering developers and enterprises to harness the […]
item.content:encoded:
Indian-made artificial intelligence (AI) platform Ola Krutrim has introduced its cutting-edge AI Cloud infrastructure, called Krutrim Cloud. It has also launched the Krutrim Assistant mobile app, unveiling its ambitious vision for fostering innovation and accessibility in India’s AI sector. This initiative signals a shift in India’s technological landscape, empowering developers and enterprises to harness the […]

The post Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: World’s First Autonomous Car Race Held at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Can you imagine a car race without any drivers? Well, it’s no longer imagination, but a reality now! That’s right, the world witnessed the first-ever professional autonomous car race over the weekend. The Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) held at Yas Marina marked a significant leap in the motor racing world. With autonomous cars […]

item.title: Meet Victoria Shi, the World’s First AI-Generated Foreign Minister
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]
item.content:encoded:
Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]

item.title: Meet Malar, India’s First Autonomous AI Professor
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Two months after Kerala got its first AI teacher, Chennai researchers have developed the country’s first AI Professor! “Malar Teacher,” as she is named, is said to be the world’s first autonomous AI university professor. Malar is fully trained on the complete engineering syllabus of Anna University, ushering in a new era of teaching. This […]
item.content:encoded:
Two months after Kerala got its first AI teacher, Chennai researchers have developed the country’s first AI Professor! “Malar Teacher,” as she is named, is said to be the world’s first autonomous AI university professor. Malar is fully trained on the complete engineering syllabus of Anna University, ushering in a new era of teaching. This […]

The post Meet Malar, India’s First Autonomous AI Professor appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Convert Blurry Videos to HD with Adobe’s New AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Adobe’s latest innovation in AI technology, VideoGigaGAN, promises to revolutionize video upscaling by enhancing resolution without compromising on quality. With its new approach, Adobe aims to address the longstanding challenges of blurry videos. It presents a solution that offers remarkable results in converting blurry videos into HD. Let’s find out more about its features and […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Hyper-V Unveiled: Best Practices for Efficient Hyper-V Backup
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Virtualization has become a cornerstone of modern IT infrastructure, enabling organizations to run multiple virtual machines (VMs) on a single physical server. In the field of virtualization, Microsoft’s Hyper-V stands out as a robust, scalable solution for creating and managing virtual machines. However, the advantages of digitization come with the responsibility of ensuring that your… […]
item.content:encoded:
